replies.message: Hey Dave. If you don't think you'll use Facebook again, you can request to have your account permanently deleted. Please keep in mind that you won't be able to reactivate your account or retrieve anything you've added. Before you do this, you may want to download a copy of your info from Facebook. Then, if you'd like your account permanently deleted with no option for recovery, log into your account and let us know here: https://www.facebook.com/help/delete_account. For more information on deleting your account, please visit our Help Center: https://www.facebook.com/help/224562897555674 -Hailey
FB deleted my account after trying multiple times to reset PW, now you want me to set up an admin, but that won't work either, this was a personal page, NOT a business...help!
